channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Vmware vRealize CodeStream Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Vmware vRealize CodeStream Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-27217|2024-08-03T05:25:32.347Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20vmware%20vrealize%20codestream%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Vmware vRealize CodeStream Plugin 1.2 and earlier stores passwords unencrypted in job config.xml files on the Jenkins controller where they can be viewed by users with Extended Read permission, or access to the Jenkins controller file system.
